post:
We are pleased to announce the launch of our new location in USA. 
We have promised and promised it and took our time in selecting what we felt would be best suited for our current clients as well as future clients.
With just shy of 100% uptime this year while promising nothing less than 99.7% uptime, we feel confident enough to boast of the the uptime we can provide while guaranteeing a realistic 99.7% as well as stability, constant performance, and a support team that are always available when needed.

The new node is a dual intel xeon Gold 6128 @ 3.4Ghz and comes with a 10gbps network port.

Our new location is in Texas, Dallas, and we are pleased to say we can FINALLY offer /64 IPv6 subnets with all of our US VM's. @JackHadrill :wink:

To celebrate the launch, we are offering 20% off all of our current plans excluding mini and mini+ plans with code "8preBF".

 **KVM VPS**
 With a HostDoc KVM VPS, you get; 
 
   Choice of **8** deployable locations.
   Full root access. 
   Virtualizor Control Panel. 
   Weekly backup & Incremental backup's 3 times per week. 
   One snapshot restore per month. 
   KVM Virtualization. 
   24/7 Technical Support. 
   Pre-configured and customisable packages. 
   NoVNC Console. 
   DDoS Mitigation in all locations.
   Instant Deployment
   Nested Virtualisation (USA only)
   /64 IPv6 (USA only)
   10gbps Network Port (USA only)
